Summary: Extract Action Items with AI Agent
Description: As a Meeting Organizer I want action items automatically extracted from discussions So that I dont miss follow-up tasks
Acceptance Criteria: AI Agent identifies action items with 90 percent plus precision; Each action item has description context and source timestamp; Action items display in structured list format; False positives less than 10 percent

Description: As an Admin I want task owners and due dates inferred from meeting context So that action items are immediately actionable
Acceptance Criteria: Owner assigned for 80 percent plus of action items based on context clues; Due dates extracted from phrases like by Friday end of month; Unassigned items flagged for manual assignment; Confidence score shown for AI-assigned fields

Summary: Summarize Agenda Coverage and Open Questions
Description: As a Reviewer I want a summary of what was discussed and what remains open So that I can quickly understand meeting outcomes
Acceptance Criteria: Summary includes agenda topics covered; Open questions/unresolved issues highlighted separately; Summary 200 words or less for 60-minute meeting; Linked to relevant transcript sections

Description: As a Reviewer I want implicit commitments identified So that verbal agreements arent forgotten
Acceptance Criteria: AI Agent flags phrases indicating commitment; Context provided for each implicit commitment; Can convert implicit commitments to formal action items; Precision 85 percent or greater

Description: As an Executive Sponsor I want a concise meeting summary with key decisions So that I can stay informed without reading full transcript
Acceptance Criteria: Summary includes key decisions critical action items risks; Length 100-150 words maximum; Generated within 30 seconds of processing completion; Professional tone suitable for leadership review

Description: As an Admin I want minutes in standard formats MRS MTQP MSAD So that output meets organizational documentation standards
Acceptance Criteria: All three templates available MRS MTQP MSAD; Templates populated with extracted data; Template selection available at export time; Template format validation passes

Description: As an Organizer I want to export minutes in multiple formats So that I can share them via different channels
Acceptance Criteria: PDF export with professional formatting; Markdown export for wiki/documentation systems; Plain text export for email; Export completes within 10 seconds; Files properly formatted and readable

Description: As a Participant I want to view all my assigned action items across meetings So that I can manage my follow-up tasks
Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard shows pending in-progress completed items; Filter by date priority meeting; Status update capability; Email notifications for approaching due dates

Description: As an Integrator I want action items automatically synced to Jira/Asana So that tasks integrate with existing project workflows
Acceptance Criteria: OAuth integration with Jira and Asana; Bi-directional sync status updates reflect in both systems; Mapping action item to Jira issue Asana task; Sync completes within 30 seconds

Description: As an Organizer I want action items with due dates added to my calendar So that I receive reminders for follow-ups
Acceptance Criteria: Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar supported; Calendar events created with task details; Reminder notifications 24 hours before due date; Updates reflect when task completed
